Interface UserRepository

  • All Superinterfaces:
    org.springframework.data.repository.CrudRepository<User,java.lang.Long>, org.springframework.data.neo4j.repository.GraphRepository<User>, org.springframework.data.repository.PagingAndSortingRepository<User,java.lang.Long>, org.springframework.data.repository.Repository<User,java.lang.Long>

    public interface UserRepository
extends org.springframework.data.neo4j.repository.GraphRepository<User>
    Repository for User objects in the neo4j database
    Author:
    Roman
